amendment.description: To delete the matching requirement for airport security-related capital investment grants.

vote.text: Amendment SA 890 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 890 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S7783, S7785, S7800-7801; text: CR S7783) To delete the matching requirement for airport security-related capital investment grants.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 890 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 890 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
